summary: Easily Remove and Add equipped shouts and powers via MCM menu and hotkey.
descriptionHtml:
Easily add and remove equipped shouts and powers via MCM and hotkey. Please be careful and don't erase shouts or powers needed for quest, etc - you can break your game!

Features:
Remove equipped shout via MCM
Remove equipped shout via hotkey
Remove equipped power via MCM
Remove equipped power via hotkey
Restore removed shouts from MCM menu.
Restore removed powers from MCM menu.
Support 128 shouts and 128 powers -  not tested. (Can be expanded to 65k if i learn a bit more about scripting).
Languages ENG, PL (Localization via mcm translation file, feel free to send me translated localization text file, i will add it to next
version.)

Beware!!!
I'm newbie modder, this is my second mod written from scratch and contact with papyrus scripting. If someone find any bug i will be glad to remove it.


MY OTHER MODS:
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89191]Spell Organizer[/url] - Easily Remove(aka hide substitute), Erase and Add learned spells via MCM menu and hotkey. [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15558]SE version.[/url]﻿
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrimspecialedition/mods/15559]Se version of Shout Organizer.[/url]
author: MaskedRPGFan
